          <title>
            <string language="en">Immobilising enzymes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stillstellende Enzyme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enzymes d'immobilisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Enzymes immobilising</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Enzimi d'immobilizzazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακινητοπόηση των ενζύμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enzimas de inmovilización</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustration show two ways of immobilising enzymes in porous glass (left) and gel beads (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gel beads</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">immobilisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">porous glass</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Methoden des Abbildung Erscheinens zwei des 
Stillstellens der Enzyme im porösen Glas (gelassen) und in den 
Gelkornen (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces voies de l'exposition deux d'illustration 
d'immobiliser des enzymes dans le verre poreux (laissé) et les petits
programmes de gel (droits).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas maneiras da mostra dois da ilustração de 
immobilising enzymes no vidro poroso (deixado) e nos grânulos do gel 
(direitos).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi modi di esposizione due dell'illustrazione 
di immobilizzazione degli enzimi in vetro poroso (lasciato) e nei 
branelli del gel (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δύο τρόπους τα ένζυμα 
στο πορώδες γυαλί (αριστερά) και τις χάντρες πηκτωμάτων (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas maneras de la demostración dos de la 
ilustración de inmovilizar las enzimas en el cristal poroso (dejado) 
y los granos del gel (derechos).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gelkorne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Immobilisierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">poröses Glas</string>
          </keyword>
